## ResolverBuilder.transient() method

Creates a resolver that creates a new instance for every dependency request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transient(value: Constructable): Resolver<K>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | [Constructable](./fast-element.constructable.md) | The type to create instances of. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Resolver](./fast-foundation.resolver.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt;

- The resolver.
